title: Beautiful three bedroom apartment in the heart of Colombo
details:
A beautiful and spacious apartment in the heart of Colombo for immediate sale to highest offer. The apartment has views of the sea to the West and Fort to the North. Three bedrooms and bathrooms with walk in closet in the master bedroom. Two customisable living spaces allowing separate seating areas for ladies and gentlemen. Ergonomically designed kitchen. Maid’s room and bathroom with separate service entrance. Urban Horizons targets a select and elite clientele valuing traditions and etiquette with the intent of creating a safe family environment.

Facilities include a swimming pool with separate timings for ladies and gentlemen, gymnasium with aerobics area, rooftop garden, childrens’ play area and visitor’s parking.

Urban Horizons Altitude houses 38 apartments on eight floors. Construction began in 2015 and is scheduled to complete end of 2018.

Serious buyers/ principals only. Priced at LKR 62 million but reasonable offers are accepted for consideration.
